--- title: LS 빅데이터 스쿨 homework2 date: '2024-07-16' author: youna categories: - bigdata --- ## 144 page #### Q1. ::: {#2541eed9 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import pydataset mpg = pydataset.data("mpg") mpg.head() displ4 =mpg.query("displ<=4") displ5 =mpg.query("displ>=5") displ4["hwy"].mean() displ5["hwy"].mean() displ5["hwy"].mean() < displ4["hwy"].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ``` np.True_ ``` ::: ::: #### Q2. ::: {#f1725010 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_audi = mpg.query("manufacturer == 'audi'") mpg_toyota =mpg.query("manufacturer == 'toyota'") mpg_audi["cty"].mean() mpg_toyota["cty"].mean() mpg_audi["cty"].mean() < mpg_toyota["cty"].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ``` np.True_ ``` ::: ::: #### Q3. ::: {#fbfd8fdb .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg2=mpg.query("manufacturer=='chevrolet'|manufacturer=='ford'|manufacturer=='honda'") mpg2["hwy"].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ``` np.float64(22.50943396226415) ``` ::: ::: ## 153 page #### Q1. ::: {#7b42cce3 .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_audi = mpg.query("manufacturer=='audi'") mpg_audi.sort_values("hwy",ascending = False).head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ## 158 page #### Q1. ::: {#047eb634 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import pydataset mpg = pydataset.data("mpg") mpg_copy = mpg.copy() mpg_copy mpg_copy = mpg_copy.assign(sum_cty_hwy = mpg_copy["cty"] + mpg_copy["hwy"]) mpg_copy.head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5} ```{=html}
